Namespace osu.Framework.Graphics.Sprites

Classes

BufferedContainerView<T>

A view that displays the contents of a BufferedContainer<T>.

FontAwesome
FontAwesome.Brands
FontAwesome.Regular
FontAwesome.Solid
Sprite

A sprite that displays its texture.

SpriteDrawNode

Draw node containing all necessary information to draw a Sprite.

SpriteIcon

A drawable representing an icon. Uses FontStore to perform character lookups.

SpriteText

A container for simple text rendering purposes. If more complex text rendering is required, use TextFlowContainer instead.

Structs

FontUsage

Represents a specific usage of a font.

IconUsage

Represents a specific usage of an icon.

Interfaces

IHasLineBaseHeight

Objects implementing this interface have a line base height when used in a CustomizableTextContainer.

IHasText

Interface for IDrawable components that support reading and writing text.
